name: The Grey Nether
description:
A little survival horror platformer created for the "Underneath the Sidewalk" challenge on Glorious Trainwrecks but also in the spirit of upcoming Halloween.

Descend into the world of grey and save your granddaughter from the claws of evil creatures lurking underneath the Sidewalk! The only equipment you have is a handgun with limited ammo and a Princess Molly flashlight.

This is as always made in the archaic Klik n Play game making program, and it is only the 2nd build so there may be some bugs and errors. Just let me know and I'll do my best to patch them up. Enjoy!
